definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: The ICC must decide whether to indict the suspects.
sentences.chinese: 國際刑事法庭必須決定是否起訴這些嫌犯。

sentences.english: The indicting condition of civil lawsuit is exact in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我國民事訴訟的起訴條件比較嚴格，對當事人不公平。

sentences.english: Not-suing is an important instition of our country's criminal suit law.
sentences.chinese: 不起訴是我國刑事訴訟法的一項重要制度。

sentences.english: The Australian government has indicated that a prosecution will follow because the ship ran aground in a no-go zone.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞政府提出起訴因爲船隻駛入了禁止區域。

sentences.english: Francis is accused of having helped him to concoct a false alibi.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯因幫助他捏造不在犯罪現場的證據而被起訴。

sentences.english: As I see it, we can't even afford to have him arrested or accused.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，要是他被捕或受到起訴，那咱就受不了。

sentences.english: Michael Vick is being indicted again for staging dogfights.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾Vick由於籌劃鬥狗再次遭到起訴。

sentences.english: N. Korea charged U. S. reporters with spying.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮以間諜罪起訴美國記者。

sentences.english: The gun the prosecutors used must have been a plant.
sentences.chinese: 起訴方用來作證的那支槍肯定是栽贓的。

sentences.english: In the second part, the litigation value and theory basis of discretional non-prosecution was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分闡述了酌定不起訴制度的基礎和價值。

sentences.english: Don't blame me for going to court since we can't settle it between us.
sentences.chinese: 我們之間的問題解決不了，休怪我到法院去起訴。

sentences.english: Then the company sued the Finance Bureau of Jinan.
sentences.chinese: 於是，該公司向當地法院起訴濟南市財政局。

sentences.english: But Koontz is only charged during his lifetime, yet without a trial.
sentences.chinese: 但昆茨生前僅被起訴，尚沒有經過審判。

sentences.english: The invention in question was the first cordless automobile cigarette lighter.
sentences.chinese: 被起訴的發明是第一汽車點菸器。

sentences.english: If a lawsuit is filed due to disputes of torts , the people's court may accept it directly.
sentences.chinese: 因侵權糾紛起訴的，人民法院可以直接受理。

definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to demand payment of money owing
